Package src.main.java

Class ToolBarPane

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.ToolBarPane
public class ToolBarPane
extends java.lang.Object
The ToolBarPane class contains all view elements for the ToolBarPane. This is then linked to the main view.
Author:
Elijah Haberman

    • updateRating

      public void updateRating​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> ratings)
      Updates the rating system based on plants. Based on the plants that bloom in the season fill the circle with the appropriate color based on the season the plant blooms.
      Parameters:
      ratings - Integer for rating.
